titleStmt.title: Two letters to Dr. Benjamin Calamy one in English, the other in Latine / by Thomas De Laune, upon his imprisonment in Newgate, for the answer given at the said Dr. Calamy's call, to his sermon entituled, A discourse about a scrupulous conscience, in a late piece called, A plea for the non-conformists, &c.
titleStmt.author: De Laune, Thomas, d. 1685.
